sentences.en: A Delta II rocket was launched from Cape Canaveral early this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天一早，一枚“德尔塔”Ⅱ型火箭在卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.en: I saw the launch of the rocket yesterday.
Interviewing politicians may not be rocket science, but it does matter.
sentences.cn: 采访政治家可能并不是什么高难度的事，但的确很重要。

sentences.en: It doesn't take a rocket scientist to make a rock record.
sentences.cn: 制作摇滚唱片并不要求你非得绝顶聪明。

sentences.en: Larsson’s shot rocketed into the back of the net.
sentences.cn: 拉森射出的球直飞网底。

sentences.en: She was fascinated at the spectacle of a rocket launching.
sentences.cn: 她被发射火箭的壮观场面强烈地吸引住了.

sentences.en: The Ariane space-rocket project has had a shining success.
sentences.cn: 阿里安航天火箭项目取得了辉煌的成功。

sentences.en: The rocket boosts the astronaut into space.
sentences.cn: 这火箭能把宇航员送入太空.

sentences.en: The rocket flight had to be aborted because of difficulties with computer.
sentences.cn: 因电脑出故障,这次火箭飞行只好中辍.

sentences.en: The rocket is due to lift off at noon on Friday.
sentences.cn: 火箭定于星期五中午发射.
火箭呼啸着朝天上飞去。

sentences.en: The rocket tumbled out of control shortly after lift-off.
sentences.cn: 发射后不久，火箭就失控坠落了。

sentences.en: The rocket was launched from a space research base.
sentences.cn: 火箭从一个太空研究基地发射升空。

sentences.en: The space rocket was launched and went into orbit.
sentences.cn: 宇宙火箭发射后进入轨道.

sentences.en: The train rocketed through the tunnel.
This space rocket carries two satellites.
sentences.cn: 这枚宇宙火箭搭载了两颗卫星.

sentences.en: You'll really get a rocket if you're late again!
sentences.cn: 你要是再迟到,肯定会受到斥责!

words.tran_cn: 火箭学，火箭技术；火箭（集合称）；火箭研究
飞驰，飞快地移动；迅速增加

phrases.phrase: rise like a rocket (and fall like a stick)

phrases.tran_cn: n. 火箭发动机；火箭引擎
火箭发射装置，火箭发射器；火箭筒，火箭发射车
火箭专家；股市分析高手；[喻]行家

trans.tran_cn: 火箭（弹），焰火，烟花，芝麻菜
trans.tran_en: a vehicle used for travelling or carrying things into space, which is shaped like a big tube

trans.tran_cn: 猛增，快速移动，一举成名，用火箭攻击
trans.tran_en: if a price or amount rockets, it increases quickly and suddenly
if a price or amount rockets, it increases quickly and suddenly
